title: Enhancing Service Quality Practical Competencies: Advanced Spatial Vector Concept Learning Course Using Virtual Robots

context.prior_knowledge: Middle school-level vector concepts and 3D coordinate system comprehension
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Students can accurately explain the composition and decomposition of vectors in 3D space through virtual robot manipulation with over 85% accuracy.
Students can solve robot path design problems applying spatial vector concepts within 10 minutes with over 70% accuracy.
Students can improve their ability to model physical phenomena using vector operations by 40% compared to pre-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
